Attorney & Legal Support

In pursuit of justice

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”tel:3179511100″ button_text=”We Can Help: (317) 951-1100″ button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”13px” button_text_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.8)” button_bg_color=”#ffba60″ button_border_width=”12px” button_border_color=”#ffba60″ button_border_radius=”0px” button_letter_spacing=”4px” button_font=”|700||on|||||” button_icon=”$||divi||400″ global_colors_info=”{}” button_border_radius__hover=”0px” button_border_radius__hover_enabled=”on” button_letter_spacing__hover=”4px” button_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”on”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Welcome Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”27px||57px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”||8px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_line_height=”1.5em” header_font=”Prata||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”38px” header_line_height=”1.3em” header_2_font=”Prata||||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_font_size=”36px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Let Lauth do the legwork

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”88%” max_width=”70%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”31px||14px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”17px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_2_font_size=”36px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”|64px|2px|||” custom_padding=”42px|||30px|false|false” animation_direction=”left” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The average attorney bills clients for between 1000-1500 hours for a single case. With so many hours being poured into a single case on average, it’s not a mystery why attorneys might have a need for legal support services. Lauth and its private investigators can pick up the slack for overburdened attorneys, reducing their workload so they may better serve their clients. We are dedicated to providing quality support to the community and playing a role in getting justice for our clients’ defendants.

Lauth has been providing legal support to attorneys for over 30 years, with comprehensive intelligence services and courtroom testimony. We use verified databases and proven methodology in pursuit of truth. With our Attorney & Legal Support services, counsel is free to focus on caselaw and develop a winning strategy for their client.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_video src=”https://youtu.be/eOr_Ex4Ys6g” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_video][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”88%” max_width=”70%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”1px||31px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text ul_item_indent=”54px” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”17px” text_line_height=”1.5em” ul_line_height=”1.8em” header_2_font_size=”36px” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”|||30px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our private investigators use only verified databases comparable to those used by law enforcement in order to conduct comprehensive background checks on the relevant subjects in your case. From those comprehensive background checks, we can develop leads, identify additional subjects, and provide crucial context that might otherwise be unavailable to the attorney. Our services can be applied to many different types of litigation, including but not limited to:

  • Child support
  • Family law
  • Domestic violence
  • Drug crime
  • Criminal justice & criminal defense
  • Brand protection
  • Unsolved homicides

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Welcome Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”27px||57px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”||8px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.24.3″ text_line_height=”1.5em” header_font=”Prata||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”38px” header_line_height=”1.3em” header_2_font=”Prata||||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_font_size=”36px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Purpose of Investigations

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”88%” max_width=”70%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”31px||14px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.24.3″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”17px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_2_font_size=”36px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”|64px|2px|||” custom_padding=”42px|||30px|false|false” animation_direction=”left” global_colors_info=”{}”]

When attorneys seek justice for their clients, they often need a manageable workload that can impede their ability to focus on crafting a winning legal strategy. Lauth Investigations has been a trusted ally for attorneys for over 30 years, providing comprehensive intelligence services and courtroom testimony to support the pursuit of justice.
With our team of experienced private investigators, we alleviate the burden on legal professionals, allowing them to serve their clients better. Our Attorney & Legal Support services are designed to enhance the effectiveness of legal counsel, ensuring that every case is thoroughly investigated and prepared for success.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://lauthinvestigations.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/attorney.jpg” alt=”attorney” title_text=”attorney” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ custom_padding=”||49px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”88%” max_width=”70%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”1px||31px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text ul_item_indent=”54px” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”17px” text_line_height=”1.5em” ul_line_height=”1.8em” header_2_font_size=”36px” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”|||30px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Lauth Investigations offers a range of services tailored to meet the diverse needs of attorneys. Our purpose-driven approach ensures that every investigation is conducted with professionalism and integrity.

● Child Support Investigations: Our investigators gather evidence to support or contest child support claims, ensuring that the child’s best interests are prioritized.

● Family Law Cases: We provide critical information in divorce, custody disputes, and alimony cases, helping attorneys build strong cases for their clients.

● Domestic Violence Investigations: Our team uncovers the truth in domestic violence cases, providing crucial evidence to support victims and hold perpetrators accountable.

● Drug Crime Investigations: We assist in uncovering the full scope of drug-related activities, from trafficking to possession, providing valuable insights for defense or prosecution.

● Criminal Justice & Criminal Defense: Our comprehensive background checks and surveillance services build robust defense strategies.

● Brand Protection: We help businesses protect their intellectual property and brand reputation by investigating counterfeit products and trademark infringements.

● Unsolved Homicides: Our seasoned investigators revisit cold cases, using advanced techniques to uncover new leads and bring closure to families.

● Fraud and Forgery Cases: We delve into complex financial crimes, uncovering fraudulent activities and providing detailed reports to support legal actions.

● Employment Law Investigations: We assist in cases of workplace misconduct, harassment, and discrimination, ensuring a safe and fair work environment.

● Corporate Investigations: Our investigators provide the insights needed to protect corporate interests from internal theft and compliance issues.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Welcome Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”27px||57px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”||8px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.24.3″ text_line_height=”1.5em” header_font=”Prata||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”38px” header_line_height=”1.3em” header_2_font=”Prata||||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_font_size=”36px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Why Hire Lauth for Investigations?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”88%” max_width=”70%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”31px||14px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.24.3″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”17px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_2_font_size=”36px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”|64px|2px|||” custom_padding=”42px|||30px|false|false” animation_direction=”left” global_colors_info=”{}”]

With seasoned professionals, cutting-edge technology, and a commitment to integrity, Lauth Investigations offers unparalleled expertise and reliability. Our services are tailored to meet each client’s unique needs, ensuring confidentiality and customized solutions.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://lauthinvestigations.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/Why-Hire-Lauth-for-Investigations.jpg” alt=”Why Hire Lauth for Investigations” title_text=”Why Hire Lauth for Investigations” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ max_width=”74%” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”88%” max_width=”70%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”1px||31px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text ul_item_indent=”54px” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”17px” text_line_height=”1.5em” ul_line_height=”1.8em” header_2_font_size=”36px” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”|||30px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Expertise and Experience
● Seasoned Professionals: Our team comprises former military and law enforcement personnel with extensive experience in legal investigations and testimony.
● Proven Methodologies: We employ tried-and-true investigative techniques and leverage verified databases to ensure the accuracy and reliability of our findings.
● Comprehensive Training: Our investigators undergo rigorous training to stay updated with the latest investigative methods and legal requirements.

Cutting-Edge Technology
● Advanced Surveillance Equipment: We use the latest surveillance technology to gather evidence discreetly and efficiently.
● Verified Databases: Our access to law enforcement-grade databases allows us to conduct thorough background checks and locate relevant parties quickly.

Integrity and Objectivity
● Unbiased Investigations: Our independence ensures that our findings are objective and credible, adding integrity to your case.
● Courtroom-Tested: Our investigators have a proven track record of providing reliable testimony in court, strengthening your legal arguments.

Tailored Services
● Customized Solutions: We understand that every case is unique, and we tailor our services to meet each client’s specific needs.
● Confidentiality Assured: We handle all investigations with the utmost discretion, safeguarding the privacy and confidentiality of our clients.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Welcome Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”27px||57px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”||8px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.24.3″ text_line_height=”1.5em” header_font=”Prata||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”38px” header_line_height=”1.3em” header_2_font=”Prata||||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_font_size=”36px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Lauth Strategies for Effective Legal Support

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”88%” max_width=”70%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”31px||14px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.24.3″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”17px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_2_font_size=”36px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”|64px|2px|||” custom_padding=”42px|||30px|false|false” animation_direction=”left” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Lauth Investigations employs various strategies to provide adequate legal support, including surveillance, comprehensive background checks, undercover operations, evidence gathering, skip traces, witness testimony, and crime scene analysis. These methods ensure thorough investigations and robust support for legal cases.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://lauthinvestigations.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/Lauth-Strategies-for-Effective-Legal-Support.jpg” alt=”Lauth Strategies for Effective Legal Support” title_text=”Lauth Strategies for Effective Legal Support” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ max_width=”88%” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”88%” max_width=”70%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”1px||31px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text ul_item_indent=”54px” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”17px” text_line_height=”1.5em” ul_line_height=”1.8em” header_2_font_size=”36px” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”|||30px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Surveillance

  • Objective: Gathering visual evidence that supports or refutes claims made in legal cases.
  • Method: Utilizing state-of-the-art surveillance equipment, our investigators conduct covert operations to observe and document relevant activities.
  • Application: Surveillance is crucial in cases of infidelity, workers’ compensation fraud, and child custody disputes.

 

Comprehensive Background Checks

  • Objective: To uncover the history of individuals involved in legal cases, including criminal, financial, and personal background information.
  • Method: We access verified databases and compile detailed reports that provide a complete picture of the subjects.
  • Application: Background checks are essential in criminal defense, family law, and corporate investigations.

 

Undercover Operations

  • Objective: To infiltrate organizations and uncover hidden activities relevant to legal proceedings.
  • Method: Our investigators go undercover within organizations to observe and document unethical or illegal behavior.
  • Application: Undercover operations effectively expose workplace misconduct, fraud, and other illicit activities.

 

Evidence Gathering

  • Objective: To collect and preserve physical and digital evidence for court use.
  • Method: Our investigators use forensic techniques to gather evidence discreetly and securely.
  • Application: Evidence gathering is critical in fraud, domestic violence, and criminal defense cases.

 

Skip Traces

  • Objective: To locate individuals who are missing or avoiding legal proceedings.
  • Method: We track down individuals and relevant parties by utilizing verified databases and investigative techniques,
  • Application: Skip tracing is used in criminal defense, family law, and debt recovery cases.

 

Witness Testimony

  • Objective: To provide credible, independent testimony that supports legal arguments.
  • Method: Our investigators are trained to testify in court, providing objective insights based on their findings.
  • Application: Witness testimony is valuable in all types of litigation, from criminal defense to family law.

 

Crime-Scene Analysis

  • Objective: To re-examine crime scenes and develop alternative theories of the crime.
  • Method: Our investigators reconstruct crime scenes and identify new leads using forensic techniques.
  • Application: Crime-scene analysis is essential in unsolved homicides and complex criminal cases.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Welcome Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”27px||57px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”||8px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.24.3″ text_line_height=”1.5em” header_font=”Prata||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”38px” header_line_height=”1.3em” header_2_font=”Prata||||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_font_size=”36px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Trust Lauth for Comprehensive Legal Support

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”88%” max_width=”70%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”1px||31px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text ul_item_indent=”54px” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”17px” text_line_height=”1.5em” ul_line_height=”1.8em” header_2_font_size=”36px” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”|||30px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

At Lauth Investigations, we are dedicated to empowering attorneys with the tools and information they need to achieve justice for their clients. Our comprehensive legal support services are designed to lighten the burden on legal professionals, allowing them to focus on what they do best—advocating for their clients.

With our expertise, advanced technology, and unwavering commitment to integrity, Lauth Investigations is your trusted partner in pursuing justice. Contact us today to discuss your needs, and let us help you uncover the truth and make informed decisions. Together, we can achieve clarity and resolution in your legal matters.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Project Section 01″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”rgba(135,158,171,0.11)” custom_padding=”11px||30px|||” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”||3px|||” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Prata||||||||” header_2_font_size=”36px” header_2_line_height=”1.6em” custom_margin=”||10px|” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”5%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}”]

How Lauth can support your case.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ admin_label=”Project Area 01″ module_class=” et_pb_row_fullwidth” _builder_version=”4.16″ width_tablet=”80%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” max_width_tablet=”80%” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_margin=”2px|auto||auto||” custom_padding=”11px|||||” make_fullwidth=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_toggle title=”Surveillance” icon_color=”#ffffff” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”21px” open_icon_color=”#ffffff” open_use_icon_font_size=”on” open_icon_font_size=”21px” _builder_version=”4.16″ title_level=”h2″ title_font=”|||on|||||” title_font_size=”22px” body_font_size=”17px” background_color=”#ffba60″ custom_margin=”||10px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Lauth uses the latest in surveillance technology to expose the unseen factors within any workplace. Our investigators have a wealth of experience in threat identification and risk assessment with regards to the safety of the workplace.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Background checks” icon_color=”#ffffff” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”21px” open_icon_color=”#ffffff” open_use_icon_font_size=”on” open_icon_font_size=”21px” _builder_version=”4.16″ title_level=”h2″ title_font=”|||on|||||” title_font_size=”22px” body_font_size=”17px” background_color=”#ffba60″ custom_margin=”||10px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Lauth uses verified databases to secure a comprehensive background report on the relevant Subjects in any fraud or forgery case. Our investigators are trained to view a person’s criminal, financial, address, and litigation history to identify significant risk factors and provide expert recommendations for our clients and their businesses.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Undercover operations” icon_color=”#ffffff” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”21px” open_icon_color=”#ffffff” open_use_icon_font_size=”on” open_icon_font_size=”21px” _builder_version=”4.16″ title_level=”h2″ title_font=”|||on|||||” title_font_size=”22px” body_font_size=”17px” background_color=”#ffba60″ custom_margin=”||10px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our investigators have the necessary tool chest to conduct objective, covert undercover operations within any organization, seeking the unseen factors in any workplace.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Evidence gathering” icon_color=”#ffffff” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”21px” open_icon_color=”#ffffff” open_use_icon_font_size=”on” open_icon_font_size=”21px” _builder_version=”4.16″ title_level=”h2″ title_font=”|||on|||||” title_font_size=”22px” body_font_size=”17px” background_color=”#ffba60″ custom_margin=”||10px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Combined with our surveillance technology to bring certainty to attorney and legal investigations, our investigators are highly trained in discreet evidence gathering to support their findings in the case.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Skip traces” icon_color=”#ffffff” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”21px” open_icon_color=”#ffffff” open_use_icon_font_size=”on” open_icon_font_size=”21px” _builder_version=”4.16″ title_level=”h2″ title_font=”|||on|||||” title_font_size=”22px” body_font_size=”17px” background_color=”#ffba60″ custom_margin=”||10px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

With the help of verified databases, Lauth skip-trace services allow investigators to locate Subjects and relevant parties in any criminal defense case. 

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Witness testimony” icon_color=”#ffffff” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”21px” open_icon_color=”#ffffff” open_use_icon_font_size=”on” open_icon_font_size=”21px” _builder_version=”4.16″ title_level=”h2″ title_font=”|||on|||||” title_font_size=”22px” body_font_size=”17px” background_color=”#ffba60″ custom_margin=”||10px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our independence and objectivity can provide another layer of integrity to your case. Lauth’s investigators are comprised of former military and law enforcement with diverse experience in legal proceedings and providing testimony on behalf of our clients.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Crime-scene Analysis” icon_color=”#ffffff” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”21px” open_icon_color=”#ffffff” open_use_icon_font_size=”on” open_icon_font_size=”21px” _builder_version=”4.16″ title_level=”h2″ title_font=”|||on|||||” title_font_size=”22px” body_font_size=”17px” background_color=”#ffba60″ custom_margin=”||10px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our investigators are here to provide a second opinion with regards to crime-scene analysis. We use methods similar to law enforcement. to rebuild a crime scene and identify alternative theories of the crime.

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://lauthinveststg.wpengine.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/law-firm-20.jpg” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”11px||30px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ max_width=”80%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”||0px|||” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Prata||||||||” header_2_font_size=”36px” header_2_line_height=”1.6em” custom_margin=”||-11px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”5%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Relevant Blog Posts

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ max_width=”80%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blog posts_number=”1″ include_categories=”1358″ excerpt_length=”400″ show_more=”on” show_author=”off” show_categories=”off” show_pagination=”off” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blog][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blog posts_number=”1″ include_categories=”1358″ excerpt_length=”400″ show_more=”on” show_author=”off” show_categories=”off” show_pagination=”off” offset_number=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blog][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Request Appoinment Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_image=”https://lauthinveststg.wpengine.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/law-firm-08.jpg” parallax=”on” custom_padding=”230px||0px|” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”|33px||55px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

excerpt.rendered: Attorney & Legal Support In pursuit of justiceLet Lauth do the legworkThe average attorney bills clients for between 1000-1500 hours for a single case. With so many hours being poured into a single case on average, it’s not a mystery why attorneys might have a need for legal support services. Lauth and its private investigators […]
